short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention is designed to automate chat replies on whatnot when going live. This bot is not intended to be used for spam

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used on WhatNot.com URLs to set automated messages that are sent on a timer or when a new user joins your live session. This bot was created by TyGuy Solutions LLC an automation services and IT Solutions Company and is in no way associated to the WhatNot Platform. This bot is intended to help users during their live shows and is not intended to be used for spam on others shows, doing so may have consequences that are out of our control.
